package.name: Psquared_PriceFactor
package.summary: Define a price factor in the system configuration which is multiplied with all product prices.
package.description:
Define a price factor in the system configuration which is multiplied with all product prices. This is helpful to increase the price amount per store view. For example the german store view.
Features: - Enable or disable price factor - Define a price factor as integer or decimal. Values between 0 and 1 reduce the price. Values greater than 1 increase the final price. - Disable the default minimal price in frontend for price factors lower than 1. - Cart clearing to prevent wrong price factors by adding products and switching to another store view.
package.notes: - Fixed misconfiguration in the config file of the extenion
